channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 25th April
item.description:
28day with give and take carriageway pothole 1000x300x40mm tarmac patch required best out of hours number 1 plus x1 NDS (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 25th April
